text:
Civic Minister Hyran ir'Tennet manages the day-to-day functioning of the capital city of [[Korth]], [[Karrnath]], though King [[Kaius III|Kaius ir'Wynarn III]] maintains ultimate authority. The Civic Minister's authority does not extend to the city watch (the [[White Lions]]), which is under the command of General [[Yorin Thauram]].

Hyran ir'Tennet is a quiet, elderly human man.
title: Hyran ir'Tennet
